text: As a 70+ yr old white democrat for #BernieSanders I am damn tired of being called #BernieBros for begging for #Healthcare for Americans #Cannabis the food #God gave me is in prohibition in #Texas I have to break the law to treat my #Cancer with a plant #GodsPlan we eat & be well https://t.co/wZ74o5qifI https://t.co/QgMzqKciHu
